markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 5" pfs="Standard">
[Sending](/Spells.aspx?ID=1665)
<actions string="Three Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 356 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** planetary

**Target** 1 creature you know well
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You send the creature a mental message of 25 words or fewer, and it can respond immediately with its own message of 25 words or fewer.
name: Sending

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 356 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** planetary

 

**Target** 1 creature you know well
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 
</row>
</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Send a message to a creature anywhere on the planet and get a reply.
</summary>
summary: Send a message to a creature anywhere on the planet and get a reply.
